attributes.action: compel the Cadbury Trebor Bassett company to produce super-sized Creme Eggs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Easter has been and gone. All across the country, kids and adults alike have gorged themselves on delicious chocolate, and now look forward to next year when it will all happen again...

But yet again, as this year, last year and the year before that, something will be missing. Something beautiful. Something full of joy. Something that the people have been desiring for many years...

That is, unless the Prime Minister can do something about it!!!

We love Creme Eggs, and it's high time Cadbury Trebor Bassett gave the people what they want…

…SUPER-SIZED CREME EGGS!!!

Make things right, in time for Easter 2008…

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
